title: The Pirate's Surrender
description: Soulmate Series Book 2All right, so he did it! Marin seduced me. And the sex is fantastic, blows my mind every time, no complaints there, if that thing about being his soul-mate didn’t still bug me. Yet there seems no way around it except…but can I do it? Do I want to do it? No, I don’t know if I’m ready to surrender. Me, the pirate, and to the blond devil, no less…talk about fucked up destiny!Don’t miss the romantic sequel to To Seduce A Soul Mate.
author: Laura Tolomei
